en: The allure of the scientific and new techniques captivated the young artists of this movement. The movement then spread abroad when Seurat and Pissarro were invited to Les Vingt, an avant-garde society in Brussels. This style became the dominant form in Belgium by 1889 and even artists like Van Gogh tried their hand at this style.
ja: 安倍首相は３０日、野党党首との党首討論で、トランプ米政権が検討している輸入車への高関税措置について、「同盟国の日本に高関税を課すのは極めて理解しがたく、受け入れることはできない」と述べ、反対する意向を明言した。
